name: stvz:clean
description:
removes all ads

(this style was a dark/red revamp of studivz.net before some changes to the studivz-page ...since i dont had the time to update it i just changed it to a simple adblock style.)
css:
/*
 * stvz:clean
 *
 * Author      : Akolyt0r aka Furion
 * Updated     : March 26th 2009
 * Website     : none yet
 * Description : Adlock
 * Currently tested for: StudiVZ german
 */

@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("www.studivz.net") {
/*REMOVE ADS -V- */
#AdLinkAhaOhoBirthdayCard,
#LeftsideBox,
#leftSideBox,
#ad300x250,
#news_staticContent,
#showcase_staticContent,
#adBackground,
#ad728x90,
#ad125x125,
#ad120x600,
#AdLogout,
#telegram_staticContent,
#mod-invitation-invitationbox
{display:none!important;}
/*REMOVE ADS -A- */
}
